AI Description: Psycopg is a popular PostgreSQL database adapter for the Python programming language. It provides a robust, efficient, and well-supported interface for interacting with PostgreSQL databases from Python applications.
Core Features: Allows Python applications to connect to and interact with PostgreSQL databases
Supports various PostgreSQL features such as server-side cursors and asynchronous communication
Facilitates executing SQL commands, managing transactions, and fetching query results efficiently
Provides a high level of compatibility with Python DB-API specification for database programming
Offers good performance and reliability for database operations
